channel.description: Recent content in software on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Five Minute GitHub Tutorial with RStudio - Simple!
item.description: What is a GitHub? Recently, I went to search for a few jobs in the tech industry and one thing stood out with each of the sites I visited. Everyone was asking “What’s your GitHub address?” Admittedly, I didn’t have one until just the other day. I posted this short five minute tutorial to get you started early! GitHub is a repository for version control hosting of coding projects and much more.

item.title: Download and Use R Studio First Program - Complete Guide
item.description: How to Download R and R Studio. After this tutorial, you will know where to download R and R studio as well as create your own R scripts. Where to Download R Where to Download R Studio Create your first script and read in a data file! Watch Video [embed]https://youtu.be/tFseuxP4C3k[/embed] Download Links The R Project for Statistics R Studio
